title: Introduction to Cybersecurity Intrusion Detection Systems: Case Analysis of GeoGuard

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge of network concepts and foundational understanding of machine learning
context.additional_context: Optimized content delivery for smartphone-based learning environments, conducted through real-time Q&A and screen-sharing

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of 1D CNN, BiLSTM, and MHA techniques for network traffic analysis
Learners can systematically construct the three-stage processing workflow (identification-classification-response) of a location-based intrusion detection system (GeoGuard)
Learners can simulate methods for handling imbalanced datasets using Focal Loss and weighted class training techniques

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
